Hey | Is the Pope gay?

In January of 2021 I created a one-pager called â€œIs the Pope gay?â€. As is the case with so many of my other ideas, I came up with this website because something happened on the Internet: the .gay domain extension had just become available. Next to isthepope.gay, I registered a wide variety of domains. My favorite was everyoneatthevaticanis.gay, which led to my own website.
